CHAT.comment: RALPH BAZE AND THOMAS C. BOWLING, Petitioners v. JOHN D. REES, COMMISSIONER, KENTUCKY DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD B. VERRILLI, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROY T. ENGLERT, JR., ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD B. VERRILLI, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:05 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
